title: Administrative Assistant
job_overview:
Supporting our residential lettings manger with the following duties: 

• Sending market appraisal letters via Reapit (our CRM system)
• Sending Terms of Business via DropBox Sign and chasing until signed
• Doing a basic AML check (checking Land Reg, requesting ID, Proof of Address, checking against sanctions list)
• Adding new properties to Reapit
• Saving any relevant communication on Reapit
• Saving all docs in the relevant folders on the shared drive
• Arranging, downloading, and adding photos + floor plans
• Checking compliance documents (mainly EPCs) before advertising 
• Advertising properties, checking various details like addresses, deposit amounts, available date, council tax bands, access arrangements, preparing brochures etc

All candidates must live in an area with reliable internet speeds and must speak English 

Please can all applicants attach a short video introduction from themselves along with their cv

Many thanks

Daniel
